revised_title: Observations on the Relative Periods of Testaceous Animal Creation and Gradual Approximation in British Strata
tldr: The author, Lewis Weston Dillwyn, discusses the relative periods of testaceous animal creation and the gradual approximation of fossil remains in British strata. He observes that internal ligaments were confined to monomyairia till after the deposition of the lias and that shells in tertiary strata can be referred to existing genera.
